1109280.name: Back To Hell
1109280.description:
This adventure game of the old-school platformer genre tells a story about a heroine called Clara who goes to the Devil Mountain to send the Devil back to the Hell.

One fine day, dark clouds covered the sky, the darkness fell on the town where Clara lived, demons settled on the streets, and there was no one to save the town except Clara. Help Clara get to the top of the Devil Mountain, send the Devil back to the Hell, and save her town.

Using the arrow buttons displayed on the screen, control the game character and jump between platforms. Moving between eight locations, collect and use the things on the way.
